column12:
'desc': [u'

Piyo Piyo Shampoo Cap Price: Rs.145

Bathing your baby can be so much fun as they splash water
column13: play with their bath toys and even try catching the bubbles and lather. This is the best time to bond with your bundle of joy as they will be relaxed and open to games and communication. It is necessary to keep the infant\u2019s scalp clean and conditioned. Using baby shampoos to cleanse and nourish a baby\u2019s scalp and hair is very common. These shampoos and soaps can create irritations and burning sensation on your tiny tot\u2019s eyes. To prevent this and to keep your little one\u2019s delicate eyes protected Piyo Piyo has created adorable Shampoo Hats. These hats are open at the top to allow you to apply shampoo on the scalp and hair. However
column14:
when you wash off the shampoo it will not seep into your darling’s fragile eyes as the Piyo Piyo Shower Cap creates a water tight seal on the forehead.

This Shower Cap from Piyo Piyo is stretchable and hence will easily fit on to your bundle of joy’s head perfectly. Made from foam rubber EVA this Shower Cap is suited for a baby’s head with circumference 18 inches and above.

']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Piyo Piyo Deluxe Bath Tub (White) Price: Rs.1200

Bath tubs are an excellent way of making bath time fun and playful for the babies so that it becomes a hassle-free task for both the mother and the baby. The Piyo Piyo Deluxe Bath Tub is a fancy and cute bath tub
column13:
which you can use to give a safe and fun bath to your baby.

This Polypropylene Bath Tub from Piyo Piyo is suitable for both boys and girls and comes with a Drain Hole and Easy Draining Features to avoid stagnation of water. The Shower Head Holder makes it comfortable for the mother to place the baby’s head on it while the Wrist Rest makes the process of giving the bath easier for the mother. This Deluxe Bath Tub comes with a Drain Plug and a Soap Dish so that you can conveniently place the soap in it while giving the bath to your baby. This Piyo Piyo Bath Tub has the dimensions of 44 x 24 x 73 cm and creates the perfect fun zone for babies to have a bath.

']

column16:
'desc': [u'

Piyo Piyo Bath Tub (White) Price: Rs.989

Bathing your infant needs a lot of care and caution. With the Piyo Piyo Baby Bath Tub you can be sure that you give your little one the most comfortable bathing experience. This ergonomic bath tub will make sure that your baby’s body and head gets ample support while you bathe her. There is a soap dish that is built into the Piyo Piyo Baby Bath Tub that will make it easy for you to locate and store the soap while bathing your child.

The showerhead holder will let you fix the showerhead on the Tub by which your hands will be free and you can more conveniently hold and caress your infant in the tub. The drain stopper will let you retain and drain out water easily from the Piyo Piyo Baby Bath Tub. Make your baby’s bath time fun and effortless with the Piyp Piyo Bath Tub.

']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Piyo Piyo Double-Layer Bath Sponge Price: Rs.165

Tired of the hissy fits your little ones throw at the mention of bath time? Don’t give up
column13: for there is hope yet. No more dragging screaming kids to the bath tub for the Piyo Piyo Double-Layer Bath Sponge promises to transform run of the mill bath time into a fun
column14: new experience. You\u2019ll be surprised at how much your kids will enjoy bathing
column15: as they become best buddies with the chirpy looking canary
column16:
sporting bright colours that are eye catching. Watch their faces light up as the smiles on their little faces spread from ear to ear.

\r\n

\r\n\tCrafted from the safest of polyurethane
column17: this bath sponge cares for your kids\u2019 sensitive skin as it cleanses it thoroughly. Narrate stories about nasty germs as your kids get engrossed in role play and take all their bath time tips seriously and step out of each shower
column18: squeaky clean and healthier by degrees. You will smile with pride as you see your little ones show off their velvety smooth skin to you. What\u2019s more
column19:
regular usage of this bath sponge promotes metabolism in your fast-growing little ones. The textured surface of this popular kids\'\xa0bath accessory stimulates your children\'s tender skin while giving them a brand new reason to celebrate growing up. Use its hooked end to hang it dry after every bath time adventure and get set for another one to come.

\n
\n ']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Piyo Piyo Bath Tub (Yellow) Price: Rs.989

Special care needs to be taken while giving a bath to small babies since their skin is extremely soft and gentle. The Baby Bath Tub from Piyo Piyo is a small and cute bath tub
column13:
which you can use to give your baby a bath.

This Baby Bath Tub proves to be useful to give a bath to new born babies since it is equipped with a New Born Head Support to avoid any damage to the fragile body of the small baby. The Drain Plug and the Easy Draining Feature of this Piyo Piyo Bath Tub makes it easy to retain and drain the water in the bath tub and avoids unnecessary stagnation. Use the Shower Head Holder to carefully place the baby’s head on it and the Soap Dish incorporated in the tub to place the soap in it while giving a bath to the baby. This fancy and attractive Bath Tub from Piyo Piyo is ideal for both girls and boys.
